Data input

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/read.R
read.Rd

Reads a gamma ray spectrum file.

read(file, ...)

# S4 method for character
read(file, extensions = c("cnf", "tka"),
  skip = NULL, ...)

Arguments

file

A character string giving the path of files to be imported.
...

Extra parameters passed to read_xyData.
extensions

A character vector specifying the possible file extensions. It must be one or more of "cnf", "tka".
skip

An integer vector or a logical scalar (see details). If NULL (the default) or FALSE, all data are imported.

Value

A GammaSpectra object if more than one spectrum are imported at once, else a GammaSpectrum object.

Details

If skip is not NULL, several channels are skipped during import to retain only a part of the spectrum. If skip is an integer vector, the corresponding chanels of the data file will be skipped. If skip is TRUE, an attempt is made to define the number of channels to skip at the beginning of the spectrum. This skips all channels before the highest count maximum. This is intended to deal with the artefact produced by the rapid growth of random background noise towards low energies.

Note

Only supports Canberra CNF and TKA files.

See also

read_xyData

Examples

# Import a Canberra CNF file
cnf_file <- system.file("extdata/test_CNF.cnf", package = "gamma")
(cnf_spectrum <- read(cnf_file))
#> Gamma spectrum:
#>   Reference: test_CNF
#>   Instrument: InSpector 1000
#>   Date: 2019-02-07 11:48:18
#>   Number of chanels: 1024
#>   Energy range (keV): -7 - 3124.91
#>   Dose rate: unknown

# Import a TKA file
tka_file <- system.file("extdata/test_TKA.tka", package = "gamma")
(tka_spectrum <- read(tka_file))
#> Gamma spectrum:
#>   Reference: test_TKA
#>   Instrument: unknown
#>   Date: 2019-06-14 14:37:56
#>   Number of chanels: 1024
#>   Energy range (keV): not calibrated
#>   Dose rate: unknown

# Import all files in a given directory
# Skip the 35 first chanels
spc_dir <- system.file("extdata/", package = "gamma")
(spc_spectra <- read(spc_dir, skip = 1:35))
#> A collection of 2 gamma spectra: test_CNF, test_TKA
